description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into electricity at will. Considered one of the most powerful Devil Fruits due to electricity's destructive capabilities.

abilitiesRevealed.description: A powerful electrical discharge capable of gravely injuring opponents. Used to defeat Gan Fall.
Can channel electricity through metal objects like swords to electrocute opponents holding them. Used to defeat Zoro.
When slashed by Zoro's swords, Enel's body effortlessly reforms from pure electricity, demonstrating Logia intangibility.

weaknesses.description: Wyper uses Seastone bandaged to his arm to nullify Enel's Devil Fruit powers on contact, draining him of his electrical abilities.

keyMoments.moment: Enel's powers are nullified by Wyper's Seastone weapon
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of an effective counter to Enel's seemingly invincible Logia abilities

keyMoments.moment: Enel defeats multiple opponents showcasing various electrical techniques
keyMoments.significance: Displays the versatility and lethality of the Goro Goro no Mi
